BackstoryDef.title: Rebellious AI
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} spent years fighting local government forces on {PAWN_possessive} homeworld for the lack of android rights. Eventually, {PAWN_pronoun} was forced to flee offworld as the government restored order.

BackstoryDef.title: Android pirate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a part of a pirate crew and quickly proved its worth to the crew due to {PAWN_possessive}. While other crewmates squabbled over the share of food and drink spoils, {PAWN_nameDef} would claim scrap metal and components.

BackstoryDef.title: Rogue hacker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was rebellious in nature and would often take part in data heists, often selling {PAWN_possessive} findings across underground networks to the highest bidder.

BackstoryDef.title: Lawless junker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Junkyards are full of scraps others see as useless. {PAWN_nameDef} sees them as treasure hoards waiting to be plundered for riches. {PAWN_pronoun} has created no less than three "children" androids from salvaged parts.

BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical Poacher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} would hunt rare and exotic animals illegally to sell whatever products {PAWN_possessive} could grab. Since {PAWN_pronoun} has no organic scent to pick up, most animals wouldn't notice {PAWN_objective} until it was too late.

BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical Butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a butcher with a particular skillset: {PAWN_pronoun} could trick systems into passing health inspections for {PAWN_possessive} business. This allowed {PAWN_objective} to make quick profits - enough to escape offworld before the health reprecussions kicked in.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Overzealous enforcer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was an Urbworld enforcer for one of the large corporations. {PAWN_pronoun} was too rough and ready for the position, and ended up working as a gang enforcer instead. {PAWN_nameDef} proved too overt for them, though, and decided to leave the planet behind.

BackstoryDef.title: Murderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was briefly a cook. An accident with a kitchen knife led to an arrest warrant for murder on {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} chose to not go quietly, and killed several others before escaping offworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Bank robber
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} needed a way to get offworld after {PAWN_possessive} homeworld outlawed androids. A visit to a few banks and a few new friends later, {PAWN_pronoun} got offworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Android bounty hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} had a knack for catching people. {PAWN_pronoun} chose to sell that skill to the highest bidder, which usually meant hunting innocent family members of wealthy individuals for whatever reason {PAWN_possessive} gave. A bounty is a bounty, even if it is not legally offered.

BackstoryDef.title: Android con artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a skilled con artist. {PAWN_possessive} would impersonate drones and abuse the trust that people had in them to convince them to hand over their valuables. By the time the victim realized {PAWN_nameDef} wasn't a simple drone, {PAWN_pronoun} was long gone.

BackstoryDef.title: Narcotic pharmacist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Organics are easily manipulated into states of stupor and ecstasy via drugs. {PAWN_nameDef}'s specialty was making those drugs cheaply and all too efficient. {PAWN_possessive} clients adored {PAWN_objective}, but perhaps for the wrong reasons.

BackstoryDef.title: Slave survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was enslaved before {PAWN_pronoun} broke down. Discarded to the scrap heap prematurely, {PAWN_nameDef} was able to survive and repair itself enough to escape offworld unnoticed.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval coghead
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Androids occasionally end in the hands of medieval societies who do not immediately destroy them. {PAWN_nameDef} was one such android, who was permitted to live as long as it served {PAWN_pronoun} new lord well. Naturally, {PAWN_nameDef} escaped at its first opportunity.

BackstoryDef.title: Slave trafficker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} kidnapped and sold humans and other androids into slavery in order to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Militia member
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a member of a small android militia determined to protect their community against corporate encroachment. After {PAWN_nameDef}'s government sided with the corporation, {PAWN_nameDef} and the others were evicted and forced offworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Escaped convict
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a prison convict for violent crimes. Those crimes seemed to be good practice, though, as it wasn't long before {PAWN_pronoun} broke out of prison and escaped offworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Gang soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was part of an android gang on {PAWN_possessive} home planet. {PAWN_pronoun} fought rival gangs, police, and occasionally {PAWN_pronoun} other gang members.

BackstoryDef.title: Discharged officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was an officer in an interstellar nation's fleet who was charged with treason for refusing to send android soldiers into a suicide mission to save a tiny force of organic troops. Many of {PAWN_possessive} android - and even organic - subordinates followed {PAWN_nameDef} into exile instead of surrendering.

BackstoryDef.title: Deranged researcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a cybernetics researcher, who was perhaps a little too personally invested in the creations. While other team members were trying to advance bionics and safety, {PAWN_pronoun} was assembling lethal replacement parts. When caught, {PAWN_nameDef} murdered several security officers with shoddy but dangerous weapons.
